title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.4 - Responsibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.4 - Responsibility

State Regulations

It shall be the responsibility of each owner, lessee or operator, manager, treasurer, assistant treasurer, or any other theatre or sporting events personnel, to file the forms TD-1A and TD-2A and maintain his name as
reported thereon on a current basis. However, such forms may be filed by others on his behalf. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
53.4

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
